languages.text: "Скверна, что запятнала погибший корабль, могла отпечататься на душах твоих слуг, элантах. Надеюсь, они позаботились об очищающих ритуалах".
"The corruption soaked into the bones of the lost ship may have imprinted itself on the souls of your servants, elantach. I hope they were thorough when they performed the cleansing rituals."
languages.original_text: "Скверна, что запятнала погибший корабль, могла отпечататься на душах твоих слуг, элантах. Надеюсь, они позаботились об очищающих ритуалах".

traits.locale_text: "The corruption soaked into the bones of the lost ship may have imprinted itself on the souls of your servants, elantach. I hope they were thorough when they performed the cleansing rituals."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “腐化已经渗入了沉船的残骸，或许已经在你仆人们的灵魂上烙下了印记，外界人。我希望他们在参加净化仪式，能得到全面的检查。”
languages.original_text: "The corruption soaked into the bones of the lost ship may have imprinted itself on the souls of your servants, elantach. I hope they were thorough when they performed the cleansing rituals."

traits.locale_text: “腐化已经渗入了沉船的残骸，或许已经在你仆人们的灵魂上烙下了印记，外界人。我希望他们在参加净化仪式，能得到全面的检查。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « La corruption qui imprégnait le vaisseau perdu a peut-être touché vos serviteurs, elantach. J'espère que les rituels de purification ont été réalisés avec le plus grand soin. »
languages.original_text: "The corruption soaked into the bones of the lost ship may have imprinted itself on the souls of your servants, elantach. I hope they were thorough when they performed the cleansing rituals."

traits.locale_text: « La corruption qui imprégnait le vaisseau perdu a peut-être touché vos serviteurs, elantach. J'espère que les rituels de purification ont été réalisés avec le plus grand soin. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «La corrupción que impregnaba los huesos de la nave perdida podría haber alcanzado las almas de tus sirvientes, elantach. Espero que sus rituales de purificación sean lo suficientemente concienzudos».
languages.original_text: "The corruption soaked into the bones of the lost ship may have imprinted itself on the souls of your servants, elantach. I hope they were thorough when they performed the cleansing rituals."

traits.locale_text: «La corrupción que impregnaba los huesos de la nave perdida podría haber alcanzado las almas de tus sirvientes, elantach. Espero que sus rituales de purificación sean lo suficientemente concienzudos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エランタよ、難破船の骨組みにまで染みこんだ腐敗はあなたの従者の魂にまで刻み込まれたかもしれない。浄化の儀式を行ったことで腐敗を切り離せていればいいのだが」
languages.original_text: "The corruption soaked into the bones of the lost ship may have imprinted itself on the souls of your servants, elantach. I hope they were thorough when they performed the cleansing rituals."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタよ、難破船の骨組みにまで染みこんだ腐敗はあなたの従者の魂にまで刻み込まれたかもしれない。浄化の儀式を行ったことで腐敗を切り離せていればいいのだが」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Die Korruption, welche in die Knochen des verlorenen Schiffs gekrochen ist, kann sich auf die Seele Eurer Diener niedergeschlagen haben, Elantach. Ich hoffe, sie haben die Säuberungsrituale mit größter Gründlichkeit und Sorgfalt durchgeführt."
languages.original_text: "The corruption soaked into the bones of the lost ship may have imprinted itself on the souls of your servants, elantach. I hope they were thorough when they performed the cleansing rituals."

traits.locale_text: "Die Korruption, welche in die Knochen des verlorenen Schiffs gekrochen ist, kann sich auf die Seele Eurer Diener niedergeschlagen haben, Elantach. Ich hoffe, sie haben die Säuberungsrituale mit größter Gründlichkeit und Sorgfalt durchgeführt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "The corruption soaked into the bones of the lost ship may have imprinted itself on the souls of your servants, elantach. I hope they were thorough when they performed the cleansing rituals."

languages.text: "Kayıp geminin kemiklerine işleyen yozlaşma, hizmetkârlarının ruhlarına da tesir etmiş olabilir elantach. Umarım arınma ayinleri titizlikle gerçekleştirilmiştir."
languages.original_text: "The corruption soaked into the bones of the lost ship may have imprinted itself on the souls of your servants, elantach. I hope they were thorough when they performed the cleansing rituals."

traits.locale_text: Kayıp geminin kemiklerine işleyen yozlaşma, hizmetkârlarının ruhlarına da tesir etmiş olabilir elantach. Umarım arınma ayinleri titizlikle gerçekleştirilmiştir."
